revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Brass tech lamp | class = TechLampBrass | game = Strife | doomednum = 197 | convid = 281 }}[[Classes]]: TechLampBrass
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named TLMPB0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR TechLampBrass { {{Property|Radius}} 8 {{Property|Height}} 64 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TECH B -1 // No, it's not bright Stop } }
